title: ArtyTorrent Pack 39-Slow Electronic Drum loops 58-79bpm-WAV samp
description:
ArtyTorrent Pack 39-Slow Electronic Drum loops 58-79bpm-WAV samples
-------------------------------------------------------------------

Downtempo drum loops programmed on drum machines and samplers. Useful for producers of slow Electro, Hip Hop and R&#039;n&#039;B.
Tempo is way down in the 58-79 bpm bracket, but you can always timestretch these loops to provide some syncopated funk in faster tracks.

Torrent contains 5 RAR files with 162 loops.
---------------------------------------------
Acid Fanatic Downbeat Electro 69 (18 loops)
Diamond Cuts Hip Hop Drums 69-79 (4 loops)
Elab Nu RnB 58-72 (86 loops)
Mac Money Electro Hip Hop 60-79 (12 loops)
Miscellaneous Drum Machine loops 60-79 (42 loops)

All samples are normalized 16-bit Acidized WAVs at 44.1KHz, looped precisely and containing the approx bpm in the filenames, ready to be dropped into your own productions, or chopped up and effected as you wish.

The samples are from a variety of sources including CDs produced by E-lab and Sony/Acid.

More packs to follow, with the tempo on the increase...

--
Arty - "These beats are so laid back, they&#039;re practically horizontal".
7th February 2008.
